titles: A vindication of the Brief discourse concerning the notes of the church in answer to a late pamphlet entituled, The use and great moment of the notes of the church, as delivered by Cardinal Bellarmin, De notis ecclesiae, justified ...
author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Sherlock. cf. NUC.
keywords: Bellarmino, Roberto Francesco Romolo, --  Saint, 1542-1621. --  Use and great moment of the notes of the church.
